comments:
Hi,
I am trying to use the table examples but while trying to run them in debug in 
eclipse I get several errors.
Tables java samples.
SimpleTableDemo.java
TableDialogEditDemo.java
TableFTFEditDemo.java
TableRenderDemo.java
TableSelectionDemo.java
TableSorter.java
TableSorterDemo.java

// ----------------?>
!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.runtime 4 2 Nov 01, 2004 12:46:21.678
!MESSAGE Problems occurred when invoking code from plug-
in: "org.eclipse.core.runtime".
!STACK 0
java.lang.ClassCastException: org.eclipse.ui.internal.EditorPane$1
$ErrorEditorPart
	at 
org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui.javaeditor.ASTProvider.activeJavaEditorChanged
(ASTProvider.java:218)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui.javaeditor.ASTProvider.access$0
(ASTProvider.java:213)
?.

// ----------------?>
Every one of them runs fine as long as not run in debug mode.
Is anyone similar with the issues? Is it because there is an issue with the 
table code or is it because there is an issue with eclipse?  Are these table 
examples usable?

Thanks,
George

You should post this to the newsgroup instead and please provide more 
information so that someone can actually help;
- where did you get the examples?
- what platform
- what build of Eclipse.

The Team component is for Source Control support in Eclipse.
